General.Name: Chibougamau Independent Mines Inc
General.Description: Chibougamau Independent Mines Inc. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of natural resource properties in Canada. The company focuses on copper, gold, zinc, silver, iron, titanium, and vanadium deposits located in Chibougamau, Quebec. The company was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in Rouyn-Noranda, Canada.
